data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Wadi Fira to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wadi Fira, Chad
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Wadi Fira, Chad.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Wadi Fira against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Wadi Fira.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Mimi, Amdang people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Mimi, Amdang people.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Wadi Fira. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Wadi Fira do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Wadi Fira, Chad to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
